love.question: Shaadi.com pe profile, {name}, tu kya likhega?
love.englishHint: On a marriage site profile, what would you write?

options.text: Foreign settled, 50 LPA package 💰 (thodi jhooth chalta hai)
Simple person, homely values, Netflix aur Maggi pasand hai 🍜
Age, height, degree—facts only. Bio likhne ka time nahi 📋
Mom ne profile banaya hai, mujhe kya pata 🤷‍♂️

love.question: Ghar pe Tinder/Bumble chalata hai to {name}, tu:
love.englishHint: When using dating apps at home:

options.text: Screen ko wall ki taraf rakhe, ninja mode 🥷
Bathroom mein lock karke, shower on karke 🚿
Open mein! Jo dekhna hai dekh lo, main independent hu 😎
Mom's voice: "Beta, yeh kaisa game khel rahe ho?" 🙈

love.question: Date par bill aaya aur {name}, situation becomes:
love.englishHint: When the bill comes on a date:

options.text: Dutch (50-50), equality bro! 💯
"Mera wallet ghar pe reh gaya" vibe check 😬
Main pay karunga/karungi, next time tum karlena ✌️
Washroom jaane ka natak, 10 min wait 🚽

love.question: First date ke liye {name}, kya pehnega/pehnegi?
love.englishHint: What would you wear for a first date?

options.text: Jo clean mila cupboard mein, no time for planning 🧦
Apna "main character" outfit, Instagram ready 📱
5 outfit changes, 20 selfies, full anxiety 😰
Comfortable but presentable, effort dikhana hai 👔
Ex ka photo, 2 saal se change nahi kiya 💔
Default wallpaper, phone liya tab se 🤖
Khud ki photo, self-love baby! 💁‍♀️
Koi abstract ya nature pic, simple rehna hai 🌄

love.question: Mummy ne rishta website pe profile banaya, {name}, tera reaction:
love.englishHint: Mom made your profile on a matrimonial site, your reaction:

options.text: "Didi ko pehle karwao, meri umar kya hai abhi!" 👧
Secret login details maangke profile delete 🥸
Go with it, matches dekhne mein kya jaata hai 🤷‍♂️
Sit with mom, preferences set karne - team effort 👪

love.question: Crush ke DM mein {name}, tu kya bhejega/bhejegi?
love.englishHint: What would you send in your crush's DMs?

options.text: "Hey" - classic, safe, boring 😐
Meme bhejke dekhte hain reaction 🤣
Story react karke 'fire' emoji 🔥
Kya DM? Real life mein hi baat karte hain 🙅‍♂️

love.question: Date late ho gaya/gayi 30 minutes, {name}, tu:

options.text: Menu memorize karke time pass, 32 dishes yaad 📖
Passive-aggressive messages bhejke status check 📱
Cancel karke ghar nikal liya, time is respect ⏰
Chill, Instagram scroll, late ho sakta hai kabhi 🧘‍♂️

friendship.question: Group pe kisi ne 'plan cancel' message bheja, {name} tu:
friendship.englishHint: Someone sent 'plan cancelled' message in the group:

options.text: "Thank god" (mind mein), "Oh no!" (message mein) 🎭
Already kapde change karke Netflix on 🍿
New plan suggest, "Ghar pe hi party karte hain!" 🎉
Seen karke ignore, reply ka mood nahi 👻

friendship.question: Friend ki job lag gayi, {name} tu kya karega/karegi?
friendship.englishHint: Friend got a job, what will you do?

options.text: "Party de!" message spam group chat mein 🍻
Genuinely happy but thoda jealous bhi 😅
Job profile stalk karke resume update 💼
Treats plan, genuine celebration for them 🎊

friendship.question: Group trip pe budget discussion, {name} tu:

options.text: "5-star mein reh lete hain!" (account balance: ₹583) 💸
Detailed excel sheet banake breakup calculate 📊
"Jo sab comfortable ho" (secretly hoping for budget) 🤐
"Mummy ne permission nahi di" - classic excuse 🏃‍♂️

friendship.question: Friend ne breakup kiya, {name} tera first move:
friendship.englishHint: Friend had a breakup, your first move:

options.text: "Arre chhod, mil jayegi/jayega aur koi" standard dialogue 🙄
"I told you so" lecture ready hai 📢
Food order + favorite movie night plan 🍕
Awkward "kya hua?" message bhejke wait 📱

friendship.question: Group mein {name}, tera role kya hai?
friendship.englishHint: In your friend group, your role is:

options.text: The Planner - sabka time waste karne wala 📆
The Disappearer - months tak offline, phir "Hey guys" 👻
The Therapist - sabki problem solver 🧠
The Freeloader - "Card bhul gaya yaar" expert 💳

friendship.question: Friend ke ex se {name}, teri mulaqat ho gayi mall mein:
friendship.englishHint: You bumped into your friend's ex at the mall:

options.text: Awkward smile, pretend phone call, bhag jao 🏃‍♀️
Ignore completely, kon hai ye aadmi? 🕶️
Full gossip session, tea collect karo ☕
Normal hello-hi, neither rude nor besties 👋

friendship.question: Friend group chat inactive ho gaya, {name} tu:
friendship.englishHint: Friend group chat became inactive, you:

options.text: Random good morning message with 20 emojis 🌞🌈🌻
"Koi zinda hai?" message after 3 months 💀
Controversial topic drop karke chaos create 🔥
Plan suggest karo, reunion ka time aa gaya 🥂

friendship.question: Friend ne new business start kiya, {name} tu:
friendship.englishHint: Friend started a new business, you:

options.text: "Bhai discount dega na?" first question 🤑
Social media pe full support, but order kabhi nahi 📱
Genuinely first customer, feedback with suggestions 🛍️
"Ye MLM toh nahi?" suspicious mode on 🕵️

career.question: LinkedIn pe {name}, tera bio kya hai?

options.text: "Passionate about everything" - generic LinkedIn bio 🤖
Achievements exaggerate karke expert ban gaya/gayi 🏆
Actually updated with real skills and goals 📊
"Looking for opportunities" - 2 saal se same status 🔍

career.question: Interview ke liye {name}, tu kya prepare karta/karti hai?
career.englishHint: For an interview, what do you prepare?

options.text: Full night cram session, morning panic attack 😱
"Strengths & Weaknesses" ke 3 generic answers 🗒️
Company research + practice + outfit ready 💯
"Jo hoga dekha jayega" attitude, wing it 🦅
"Haanji, ok sir/ma'am" to whatever they offer 🙏
Market research karke confident ask 📈
Expected batane mein hi nervous breakdown 😓
Exaggerate karke, fir settle on middle ground 🎯

career.question: Work from home mein {name}, tu kya pehenta/pehnti hai?
career.englishHint: In work from home, what do you wear?

options.text: Formal shirt + pajama combo, camera framing expert 📹
Full formal, professionalism is a lifestyle 👔
Last night's t-shirt, camera off gang 🙈
Fresh top, messy hair, "camera not working" status 🤐

career.question: Resume gap explain karne ke liye {name}, tu:
career.englishHint: To explain a gap in your resume, you:

options.text: "Personal reasons" - standard vague answer 🤷‍♂️
"Skills develop kar raha tha" (Netflix skills) 🎬
Honest but strategic explanation with learnings 📚
"Market mein jobs hi nahi thi" blame game 🎮

career.question: Office ke free food/snacks ke liye {name}, tu:

options.text: Tiffin box hidden in bag for takeaway 🍱
"Diet pe hu" bolke bhi 5 samose kha leta/leti hu 🥟
Reasonable portion, leave some for others 🤝
"Meeting hai" bolke extra trip for snacks 🏃‍♂️

career.question: Meeting mein "any questions?" pucha toh {name}, tu:
career.englishHint: When asked "any questions?" in a meeting, you:

options.text: Kuch bhi puch lo, silent meeting awkward hai 🤔
Actually prepared good question to show interest 🧠
Mute pe "No sir/ma'am" bolta reh gaya/gayi 🔇
"Can you repeat the action items?" - classic save 🦺
"Jo aap thik samjho sir/ma'am" - no negotiation 🐑
Achievement list with dates, receipts ready 📋
Emotional appeal - "market inflation, loans, etc" 😢
Other offers mention karke pressure create 💼

personality.question: Subah alarm bajne pe {name}, tu:
personality.englishHint: When the morning alarm rings, you:

options.text: 9 alarms set, sabko dismiss karta/karti hu 😴
First attempt mein uth jata/jati hu, morning person 🌞
"5 minute aur" that becomes 50 minutes 🕔
Alarm ko gaali deke phone dusre room mein fek diya 📱

personality.question: OTT subscription {name}, tera scene kya hai?

options.text: "Password bhej do" gang - 0 paid subscriptions 🔑
Main account holder, 5 log free mein use karte hain 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦
1-2 genuine subscriptions, baaki telegram zindabad 🏴‍☠️
Multiple paid accounts, content is worth it 💸
Full panic mode, charger dhundho emergency 😱
Power saving on, brightness zero, survival mode 🔋
Ignore warning, phir complain when it dies 💀
Always power bank ready, prepared for this 🔌

personality.question: Unexpected guests aaye ghar pe, {name} tu:
personality.englishHint: Unexpected guests arrived at home, you:

options.text: Fake smile + internal screaming combo 😬
"Bahar chalte hain" suggest karke ghar save 🏠
Hide in room, "mujhe nahi pata koi aaya hai" 🙈
Genuinely welcome with whatever snacks available 🍪

personality.question: Digital payments fail ho gaye, {name} tu:

options.text: Cash? Woh kya hota hai? Empty wallet panic 💸
Multiple UPI apps try karo one by one 📲
Always emergency cash in wallet, old school 💰
"Mera dost pay karega" - instant solution 👬
Food pics - "look where I'm eating!" 🍕
Gym/running screenshots - "fitness is lifestyle" 💪
Motivational quotes repost from other pages ✨
Minimal posting, mostly just watching others 👀
"Next mein kya hoga" predict karte rehna 🔮
Phone scroll + movie half attention combo 📱
Full focus, "shhh" to anyone who talks 🤫
IMDB pe ratings check mid-movie 🌟

personality.question: Zomato/Swiggy pe order karte time {name}, tu:

options.text: Reviews padhke overthink for 40 minutes 🧐
Same 3 items order on repeat, comfort zone 🔄
Coupon codes dhundne mein 30 min waste 💸
Quick decision, know what you want 🚀
